Languages: Understands Deep Speech but can't speak

Traits.Name: Ink Absorption
Traits.Content: The Inkwell Maw can absorb ink-based spells and effects, reducing their damage to zero and healing itself for half of the total damage prevented.

Traits.Name: Suffocating Swell
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the Inkwell Maw must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the start of its next turn, as they struggle to breathe in the living ink.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Inkwell Maw makes two Primary Melee Attacks.

Actions.Name: Primary Melee Attack
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) damage (bludgeoning). The target must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or lose the memory of one ability or spell until they take a long rest.

Actions.Name: Ranged Ink Shot
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) damage (necrotic). The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn as the ink oozes into their lungs.

Actions.Name: Suffocating Ink Burst
Actions.Content: The Inkwell Maw releases a burst of living ink in a 15-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the saving throw are also blinded until the end of their next turn, as they struggle to clear the ink from their eyes. This action recharges on a roll of 5 or 6 on a d6.
